ListCtrl.Name: CallList
ListCtrl.Heading: 座席号,50;座席姓名,100;呼出,50;呼入,20;未应答,80;总时长,80;平均时长,160;接通率,80;

DbDetails.DbTable: gwcalls as g inner join userlogin as u on g.callerid= u.user_name or g.calledid=u.user_name inner join SeatsInfo as s on u.agentid=s.id
DbDetails.Data: s.seatsno,s.seatsname,count(case when g.callerid=u.user_name then 1 else null end)as outcount,count(case when g.calledid=u.user_name then 1 else null end)as incount,count(case when g.calledid=u.user_name and g.conntime='' then 1 else null end)as inaccept,sum(duration) as totalduration,avg(duration) as avgduration
DbDetails.queryFormat: select *,case when a.incount=0 then 0 else convert(float,a.incount-a.inaccept)/convert(float,a.incount) end as rate from (select %{data} from %{dbtable} where %{where} group by s.seatsno,s.seatsname) as a
